- A Sept. 7, 2021, story by Brazilian news site Diário do Centro do Mundo, headlined, "Bolsonarista wears costume inspired by Capitólio’s ‘Viking’ in coup act," confirmed that images of the horned man were taken at a rally in São Paulo. Reference: https://www.politifact.com/factchecks/2023/jan/09/tweets/viral-photo-of-copycat-qanon-shaman-in-brazil-wasn/ published on 2023-01-09 00:00:00
correction_response:
This tweet is misleading. The photo from Brazil is real but it wasn't taken during the recent attacks in Brasília. It was first posted online in September 2021 at a rally in São Paulo, not during the January 8th, 2023 attack on Brazil's congress. Furthermore, former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro was in Florida for medical reasons, not related to the events in Brazil. There's no evidence of Florida MAGAt's involvement in the Brazilian incident. 
References: 
https://www.politifact.com/factchecks/2023/jan/09/tweets/viral-photo-of-copycat-qanon-shaman-in-brazil-wasn/
https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-investigates-who-led-anti-democratic-riots-capital-2023-01-09/
note_1_text: The Brazilian shaman (on the left) is from a protest in Brazil from Sep. 2021.  The American shaman (on the right) is from Jan. 2021.     https://www.boomlive.in/fact-check/brazil-protests-bolsonaro-lula-brasilia-supreme-court-factcheck-20687
note_2_text: User is attempting to speculate as to the identity of a protester in Brazil as a MAGA aligned individual which is pure speculation based on how someone is dressed. This is an opinion not a fact.
